001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
004import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
005
006/** A command component and additional arguments operator. */
007public interface Composer<T extends Command<T>> extends UnaryOperator<T> {
008
009  /** {@return a command composer that always returns the same command instance} */
010  static <C extends Command<C>> Composer<C> identity() {
011    return command -> command;
012  }
013}
